9712 Medical Center Dr,
Rockville, MD, 20850, USA
Carol J. Bult is with the National Center for Geographic Information and Analysis, University of Maine, Orono, ME.
Judith A. Blake is with the Jackson Laboratory, Bar Harbor, ME,04649-1500
Hamilton O. Smith is with the Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine, Baltimore, MD, 21205.
Gary J. Olson, Claudia I. Reich, Brian P. Klaine, and Carl R. Woese are with Microbiology Department, University of Illinois, Champaign-Urbana, IL, 61801.
Joseph M. Merrick is with the State University of New York, Department of Microbiology, Buffalo, NY, 14214.
All other authors are with The Institute for Genomic Research, 9712 Medical Center Dr, Rockville, MD, 20850.
Predicted open reading frames were determined using GeneMark software, kindly supplied by Mark Borodovsky, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA, 30332.
e-mail: mark@amber.gatech.edu
Submission and annotation: Owen White
e-mail: owhite@tigr.org
Biological role information, putative identifications, sequence alignments, on-line name and sequence search capability are available at TIGR's World Wide Web site.
(URL: http://www.tigr.org/).
